programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elizabeth and Michael are retired and want to move closer to their kids and grandchildren. They want to downsize from their two-story house into a bungalow. Luckily, Eve knows all about luxury bungalows. Elizabeth loves to exercise and really would like a gym. Michael has a passion for cars and needs at least a three-car garage. Their current house is dated so they would love a house that is turnkey. Eve will do her best to find their forever home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Ashley and Ali are ready to take their relationship and living situation to the next level. The young entrepreneurs are prepared to move into a house, but the one thing they can't agree on is where to live. Ashley wants an estate home outside the city that has an outdoor pool and beautifully manicured gardens. Ali, on the other hand, insists on being close to his downtown office and walking distance from restaurants and shops.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Hang out with Pinkfong and Baby Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Pinkfong Around the World
programme.desc: Guess where Pinkfong, Baby Shark and Sam are now? Follow them to the library, Kid's Cafe, Singapore and Malaysia.

programme.title: Ambulance Rescue Special
programme.desc: We Are The Pinkfong's Super Rescue Team! We solve all the problems in the town!

programme.title: Back to School Pinkfong Songs
programme.desc: It's a Back to School season Start your day with our songs and have a great time at school!

programme.title: Fun with Phonics
programme.desc: Mommy! Daddy! How do you say this? It's time to let your children to read the words by themselves. Phonics song by Pinkfong will make your children to say new words by themselves! Pinkfong brings "Fun with Phonics" to you!

programme.title: Pauline Black Ska & Reggae Legends
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pauline Black Ska & Reggae Legends
programme.desc: The Selecter's lead singer with 25 innovators & trend-setters who made ska & reggae such an essential part of the 70s. From Desmond Dekker to Eddie Grant via Bob Marley & The Beat!

programme.title: Summer Loving!
programme.desc: Non-stop summer love songs, back to back, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Sweet Soul Music! 1971-1979
programme.desc: What a decade for soul singers, and this is 60 minutes of the very best. Including Stevie Wonder, Diana Ross, Barry White & The Stylistics.

programme.title: David Bowie: Sound & Vision!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 David Bowie: Sound & Vision!
programme.desc: From 1969's chart debut "Space Oddity" to 1980's "Ashes to Ashes" - Bowie was the ultimate icon of the decade. Here are 13 videos - with huge hits, but some you might not know!

programme.title: Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Clare Grogan's Teenage Kicks!
programme.desc: The 5 years from '77 to '81 was possibly the most exciting & vibrant time to be a teenager & Clare Grogan was there - buying the records, seeing the bands & wearing the t-shirts!

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: The 1979 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The 1979 POWER Hour with Bam!
programme.desc: Seventies music power to play loud! Work out your speakers with some pure power pop and rock including AC/DC, Kiss, and Meat Loaf!

programme.title: The NOW Yearbook 1979
programme.desc: 1979 was another top year in music, with pop, disco & new wave rubbing shoulders with rock, synth & 2-Tone. Simon Bates has the story - month by month.

programme.title: 1979 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1979!

programme.title: It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 It Spent HOW Long At No.1 ?!
programme.desc: Once these tracks made it to the top spot there was no knocking them off! This is our countdown of the 50 longest chart toppers of the 1970s!

programme.title: We Will Rock You!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 We Will Rock You!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & guitar anthems! A classic decade for Queen, Status Quo, Led Zepp, Black Sabbath, The Stones & Thin Lizzy.

programme.title: The Complete Queen! 1972-1989
programme.desc: Nearly 20 years of rock classics from the biggest band of the era - Queen! 35 videos from 72's Liar to 89's The Miracle - via a multitude of all-time rock anthems.

programme.title: 50 Years On - 1975's Best Sellers!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 50 Years On - 1975's Best Sellers!
programme.desc: A complete rundown of the 30 biggest selling UK singles UK for 1975 - can you believe these were all hits 50 years ago? And if you thought Abba were at number 1 - think again!

programme.title: 1977 Unleashed!
programme.desc: Classic hits from just 1 year - 1977!

programme.title: Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rick Wakeman's WILD Things!
programme.desc: Remember when rock was WILD? From '64 to '74 the pioneering heroes presented by a man who was at the centre of it all - from The Kinks to The Beatles to Black Sabbath to Queen!

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Corn: Argentina's favourite ingredient
programme.desc: Corn is a big staple ingredient in Argentinian cuisine, and chef Natalia Machado makes tamales, corn and squash and chorizo stew, chicken in a creamy corn sauce, and then creamy corn pudding for dessert.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michael's antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle D'Aosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle D'Aosta's unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The popular region of Tuscany is known for its wines, cheeses, and gorgeous sights. Chef Michael Bonacini introduces us to Tuscany's fine cuisine with four of his favourite dishes. Michael draws attention to the importance of mushrooms in Tuscan culture with an antipasto: Many Mushroom soup. Warm, hearty, and full of earthy flavour, Michael tops this soup with fried sage leaves to combine comfort and crunch in a single bite. For his primo, Michael explores a Tuscan favourite - Lamb Ragu! Served over pici noodles, Michael's rich ragu is complemented by fresh, light herbs. Then, Michael serves up a Porchetta-Style Duck, a crispy and tender secondo. To bring his meal together, Michael ends...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: From hearty inland crops to fresh food of the sea, the Venetian region covers it all. Host Michael Bonacini begins with the sea as he serves up an antipasto of succulent Soft Shell Crab. Michael pairs the crab with a Tangy Aioli made from sundried tomatoes, creating the perfect combination of crispy and creamy. Moving inland for his primo, Michael twists together two classic Venetian dishes to make a new favourite: Radicchio Risotto! With his secondo, Michael cooks up a light and creamy Pancetta-Wrapper Snapper with Pea Mash. Sweet and tender, this dish will melt in your mouth. Whether you're in the mood to share or feeling a little selfish, Michael's Giant Almond Crumb Biscuit covers it...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Join engaging host, Bianca Osbourne, for a taste of two countries. First stop? Italy! Check out her recipe for succulent wild boar ribs, braised until tender, rolled in gremolata, and served over silky polenta. Next up? A culinary tribute to China, pairing lobster claw with chili oil, pomelo foam, and oyster sauce glazed bok choy. Every episode features a 'common ingredient', this time? It's noodles! Drool over two recipes: Italian classic Olio e Aglio next to chewy Chinese long Noodles tossed with Sichuan Chili Oil. For the big finale, Bianca blends Italian style with Chinese flavour for a one-of-a-kind CombiNation Plate: Kung Pao Pork Osso Bucco over Forbidden Black Rice Risotto... made...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? Peanut- chili Sate sauce replaces walnut for Pazili TrancÌ§a, a classically Turkish halibut presentation, also served here with unique,...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: From Canada to Greece, CombiNATION Plates always covers lots of ground! Kicking off, host Bianca Osbourne wows with ubERS-Canadian Roasted Venison Loin, yummy Fiddlehead Pancakes and sweet-tart Cranberry sauce. Next, enjoy a scenic Mediterranean vacation on a plate with her completely new approach to Greek Salad, taken up a notch or two with tasty seared Albacore Tuna! This episode's 'common ingredient' is lamb shank; check out two wildly creative re- inventions; first, of Canadian TourtieÌ€re, and then, Greek Dolmades. For a final recipe, a dessert fit for a lumberjack or a Greek god! Oka Saganaki with McIntosh Apple Butter and Maple Loukoumades; made with nutty Canadian Oka cheese,...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: In this episode of CombiNATION Plates, host Bianca Osbourne starts in Mexico with her version of popular street snack, 'Esquites', re-invented here as sweet corn flan. Next is Norway, don't miss explosively exciting quick-smoked Arctic Char with Forage, you've NEVER seen anything like this before. The common ingredient is tacos! From Norway, 'Lefse' is a potato-flour 'tortilla' served with fresh berries and uniquely Scandinavian 'Brunost' cheese. Representing Mexico, check out spicy pork and pineapple 'Tacos al Pastor'. The Big Dish is Lamb Pinnekjott with Birch Bark Tamale, lamb ribs are seasoned, birch bark is stuffed with masa and veggies, both are steamed over birch branches and boozy...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Join Bianca Osbourne to taste and combine! Fun CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne starts this episode with an inspired tribute to Georgian cuisine; Beef Tartare with Tkemali (sour plum sauce), marigold powder, and tart, crunchy pickles. Next; feast your eyes on her unique Hong Kong dumpling: plump scallops, pork, and veggies are blended, rolled, steamed, sliced, and then served with Crispy Yu Choy and XO. The common ingredient is rabbit! Georgia offers up Rabbit 'Mtsvadi', grilled and glazed with pomegranate reduction. Hong Kong represents with Sweet and Sour Rabbit, Grilled Pineapple and Red Pepper Coulis. Finally, Georgian Milk Braised meets Chinese/Hong Kong-style Roast Duck with...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates host Bianca Osbourne is always looking for the best food in the world to share. The first stop is South Korea with her Sesame Crusted Tuna 'Yukhoe', a delicious blend of favourite Korean flavours. Next stamp on the passport? Spain! Mouth-watering Duck Breast is seared and served rare with a crispy artichoke heart, membrillo, olives, and sweet-savoury sherry reduction. Beef short ribs are the common ingredient with Catalonian Braised and Romesco to one side and sticky Korean Kalbi-style grilled to the east! For the topper, drool over Bulgogi Octopus simmered and served with saffron-scented Sticky Rice Paella cakes, finished with crispy Paprika-Gochujang battered mussel....

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini highlights the tiny region of Molise, exposing some of its best kept savoury secrets. Starting with a classic, Michael cooks up a delicious multi-layered Chicory Timbale, a pie filled with fresh chicory, ripe roma tomatoes, and sliced prosciutto. To crisp up the top of the pie, Michael tops his delicious dish with finely grated pecorino cheese and crunchy breadcrumbs. Next up, Michael's primo is a spicy Octopus in Purgatory. This tender, colourful, and sumptuous dish is sure to impress in both looks and taste! For his secondo, Michael cooks up a traditional Marinated Rabbit. Stewed in wine, tomatoes, and chilies, this rustic dish will have your guests asking for...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Delving into the cold mountainous region of Valle D'Aosta, Celebrity chef Michael Bonacini whips up a meal of four hearty dishes that are sure to warm up any chilly day. First up is Michael's antipasto of Wild Mushrooms and Lardo on Rye. Coated with rich, earthy mushrooms, buttery fontina cheese, and savoury cured pork, this decadent dish highlights a combination of iconic flavours from Valle D'Aosta. Next up is a twist on traditional pasta with Valle D'Aosta's unique Chestnut Fettucine topped with Sweet Pork and Earthy Cabbage. The secret to this dish? Chestnut flour to create a denser, sweeter, and nuttier pasta. For his secondo, Michael turns to the pride of the region, Fontina cheese,...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Charming host Chef Michael Bonacini explores the mountainous region of Basilicata with a feast fit for any celebration. Beginning with an antipasto that caters to the region's southern heat, Michael stuffs crunchy sweet peppers with ripe tomatoes, savoury anchovies, and fresh oregano. Moving on to the primo, Michael cooks up a creamy Vermicelli Frittata. Using leftover pasta, he combines eggs with cheese, anchovies, and chili flakes for extra flavour to make a classic Basilicata dish. Michael cooks up Pollo Alla Potentina, a traditional meal from the Feast of Saint Gerard. This hearty chicken stew is sure to heat up your core, using hot peppers as the base of the meal. For his final dish,...

programme.title: Cook the Books
programme.desc: Chef-host Shahir Massoud tries out recipes from another award-winning cookbook: Diasporican by Illyanna Maisonet! Follow along as Shahir prepares Puerto Rican favorites like mofongo – a hearty plantain mash, crispy and delicious rice, a gorgeous rolled cake, and much more!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Join engaging host, Bianca Osbourne, for a taste of two countries. First stop? Italy! Check out her recipe for succulent wild boar ribs, braised until tender, rolled in gremolata, and served over silky polenta. Next up? A culinary tribute to China, pairing lobster claw with chili oil, pomelo foam, and oyster sauce glazed bok choy. Every episode features a 'common ingredient', this time? It's noodles! Drool over two recipes: Italian classic Olio e Aglio next to chewy Chinese long Noodles tossed with Sichuan Chili Oil. For the big finale, Bianca blends Italian style with Chinese flavour for a one-of-a-kind CombiNation Plate: Kung Pao Pork Osso Bucco over Forbidden Black Rice Risotto... made...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Turkey, think Silk Road spices. Indonesia, lots of seafood and tropical fruits! Curious and adventurous host Bianca Osbourne is your CombiNATION Plates culinary guide through both food cultures. First, check out Turkish Spice Crusted Lamb Rack with yogurt and blistered peppers. Next, an Indonesian tribute: Crab Leg with Coconut Curry. For the 'common ingredient'? Two takes on tender, savoury eggplant! Turkish Eggplant is braised and served with parsley and feta and the Indonesian take is served with fried garlic and sweet soy. For the CombiNATION Plate? programme.desc: Part one of a new series of ambient drone films for relaxation, America From Above is a spectacular yet ultra-soothing 1-hour long natural journey that sweeps viewers gently above America's vistas. programme.title: Oahu Morning Waves

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: In the heritage lanes of the mediterranean island, buried in the depths of time, are the archaeological sites of Cyprus. Be it Khirokitia, one of the most significant Neolithic settlements of Cyprus, Paphos, a mysterious city with Greek influences, or the vibrant splashes in the churches constructed during the Byzantine rule - Cyprus is rich in its heritage.

programme.title: 10 Days Estonia
programme.desc: Marco and Erica soak in the vitality of the student town, Tartu, and experience its eccentricities at the Leaning House and the AHHAA Science Centre. Following this, they visit Obinista, the cultural centre of Setomaa, where the Seto community introduces them to the traditional ways of dressing, singing and dancing. They also indulge in a traditional smoke sauna at nearby Võromaa.

programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits the city of Ganja in Azerbaijan, where she uncovers the history at sights like Heyder Aliyev Park and Mausoleum Nizami.

She also pampers herself with a relaxing crude oil spa treatment, and goes on to explore Khinalug Village, a hidden gem.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: This exhilarating city of castles, beer and segway rides can take you on a break that will truly leave you catching your breath.

programme.desc: Visit Belgrade, with Heather as she explores the city, its architecture and learns about its past by visiting historical monuments.

programme.title: Round 2: Silverstone 500
programme.desc: Watch the second round of the 2025 British GT Championship at Silverstone Circuit.

programme.title: IndyCar vs Formula 1 car: Technical Comparison
programme.desc: Which is faster: Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 car, or Scott Dixon's Indycar? Both have had major success in their respective championships, but how different are the two machines? Using our latest 3D animations, Jake Boxall-Legge breaks down everything there is to compare Indycar and Formule 1 cars, from aerodynamics, power, tyres, fuel and more.

programme.title: How Formula 1 Setups Change For Downforce Vs Power Tracks
programme.desc: What makes a Formula 1 downforce track different to a power track? We've all heard the terms before, but different tracks require vastly different car setups to get the maximum advantage around a lap. But what are these requirements? Jake Boxall-Legge dives into why Imola, Monaco, Silverstone and Monza all require different changes to a car to succeed across the board.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: Everything You Need to Know About TYRES in Motorsport
programme.desc: Tyres play a vital role in getting the driver from A to B in a race. Here's the rundown of the variety of tyres and how they are used across different motorsports. programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society. 0:00 A2RL - Autonomous Racing 1:00 What is A2RL and Why it's Different 3:05 The Challenge's Format 3:38 The Future of A2RL Beyond 2024 5:23 Interest from the World of Motorsport 6:44 The Tech Powering the Cars 7:44 How the Cars Drive...

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: Tour Auto 2025
programme.desc: The Tour Auto 2025 came to an end after five days of emotion, performance and conviviality on France’s most beautiful roads. From Paris to Nice, this 34th edition brought together over 240 historic vehicles, offering a unique spectacle mixing motor sport, heritage and tradition. Setting off from the Château de Vaux-le-Vicomte in Paris on Tuesday April 8, the participants crossed exceptional landscapes and competed in timed events on circuits and closed roads. Thousands of spectators flocked to each stage, confirming the continuing enthusiasm for the event and its automotive heritage. From Paris to Nice, via Alsace and the Massif Central, each circuit and stopover town gave the...

programme.title: A2RL Explained - Extreme Engineering On Track
programme.desc: We've seen autonomous racing try to take off before, but A2RL, the Abu Dhabi Autonomous Racing League, is set to push the boundaries of what autonomous racing really can be. We sent Alex Goy over to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to find out what clever tech powers the cars, how they manage to compete in various challengers without a driver (including overtaking, fastest lap and even a man vs machine challenge), and why A2RL is relevant to today's society. 0:00 A2RL - Autonomous Racing 1:00 What is A2RL and Why it's Different 3:05 The Challenge's Format 3:38 The Future of A2RL Beyond 2024 5:23 Interest from the World of Motorsport 6:44 The Tech Powering the Cars 7:44 How the Cars Drive...

programme.title: Behind the Scenes of A2RL’s Autonomous Racing
programme.desc: We've gone over how A2RL's autonomous cars work (if you haven't seen our previous video, check it out below), but what happened when the cars finally hit the track to race? From 8 cars running in qualifying, to racing against ex-F1 driver Daniil Kyvat, to the final 4-car race, the cars were certainly put through their paces. We sent Alex Goy to Abu Dhabi's Yas Marina to see just how A2RL's autonomous cars got on at their first major event.

programme.title: IndyCar vs Formula 1 car: Technical Comparison
programme.desc: Which is faster: Lewis Hamilton's Formula 1 car, or Scott Dixon's Indycar? Both have had major success in their respective championships, but how different are the two machines? Using our latest 3D animations, Jake Boxall-Legge breaks down everything there is to compare Indycar and Formule 1 cars, from aerodynamics, power, tyres, fuel and more.

programme.title: How Formula 1 Setups Change For Downforce Vs Power Tracks
programme.desc: What makes a Formula 1 downforce track different to a power track? We've all heard the terms before, but different tracks require vastly different car setups to get the maximum advantage around a lap. But what are these requirements? Jake Boxall-Legge dives into why Imola, Monaco, Silverstone and Monza all require different changes to a car to succeed across the board.

programme.title: The banned Lotus that wasn't actually very good
programme.desc: The twin-chassis Lotus 88 is considered the last truly ground-breaking design attempted by Colin Chapman, but we never found out how fast it could have been because it was never allowed to race. However, as Giorgio Piola reveals, while rivals feared the concept, its drivers were not convinced the 88 would have delivered on the track. How did it work? Jake Boxall-Legge guides you through Chapman's complex idea to make ground effect cars more user-friendly.

programme.title: Thrill of the Race - Season 2: Episode 6 - There's Nothing in it!
programme.desc: Thrill of the Race, episode 6 and it is coming from the summer Brands Hatch round with an incredible performance from Ryan Vickers! It's time for Thrill of the Race from Brands Hatch

programme.title: 1000 Lakes Rally 1986
programme.desc: The Italian Lancia and the French Peugeot teams came to the renowned 1000 Lakes Rally hotly disputing the manufacturers' title, with Markku Alen matched against Timo Salonen. Peugeot, however, had another ace in the pack in the shape of 27 year-old rising local star Juha Kankkunen, who was looking extremely good for the drivers' championship. This video captures in enthralling fashion the red-hot battle through the Finnish forests, with their huge ‘yumps’ and flat-out straights. Always a rally to set the pulses racing, Alen had the Lancia Delta running at its best and his ability to control the S4 at seemingly impossible speeds and angles will amaze the viewer. Supporting him would be...

programme.title: Regrets, Family and Ducati: A Deep-Dive with MotoGP's Marc Marquez
programme.desc: In an exclusive interview, Uri Puigdemont sits down with eight-time World Champion and newest Ducati MotoGP rider, Marc Marquez. In it, Marc talks about his career-defining switch from Honda to Ducati in 2023, the relationship between himself and brother Alex as they both compete for the sport’s greatest prize, how his family are dealing with the fights on-track, and how he’s getting along with new teammate Francesco Bagnaia. There’s also a deep-dive into Marquez’s mentality, from the recent chaos of that aborted start in Austin, the crash that ended his perfect start to 2025, and what Marc would tell his 18 year old self, nearly 15 years after his first World Championship in the 125cc...

programme.title: How the FIA Robbed Hamilton's 2008 Belgian GP Win
programme.desc: After an intense battle with Kimi Raikkonen, Lewis Hamilton put on an incredible performance to cross the finish line first at the 2008 Belgian Grand Prix. But he never won... In the latest of Autosport’s “Short View Back to the Past” series, Chief Editor Kevin Turner looks at when Hamilton was robbed at Spa.

programme.title: Top 10 Senna Moments
programme.desc: Qualifying performances from "another dimension"; thrashing his rivals repeatedly in torrential wet conditions; doing whatever it took to win the world championship at all costs. Ayrton Senna's too-brief time in Formula 1 was a colourful tapestry of brilliant driving and high-stakes controversy. On the 25th anniversary of his tragic crash at Imola, Autosport brings you the most unforgettable moments of the late Brazilian's F1 career.

This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The main event will see two of the light heavyweight division’s most explosive young prospects clash as Romania’s Stefan Latescu (17-3, 8 KO) faces Turkey’s Cem Caceres (16-1, 13 KO). Belgium based Albanian Berjan Peposhi (29-4, 16 KO) will compete in the co-main event. The always exciting featherweight welcomes rising star Ayoub Bourass (14-1, 4 KO) in to make his GLORY debut. International Muay Thai superstar Youssef Boughanem (188-43-8, 120 KO) returns for his sophomore GLORY outing against tough Italian Angelo Volpe (38-5, 12 KO). Former middleweight title contender Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-10, 36 KO) takes on Antwerp’s own Jente Nnamadim (21-5, 11 KO), who comes in to make his GLORY...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The welterweight superfight between former GLORY world champion Endy Semeleer (36-2, 18 KO) and current GLORY lightweight world champion Tyjani Beztati (26-4, 9 KO) will take center stage in the main event of the evening. After dominating the lightweight division, Beztati moves up to welterweight for the very first time in his GLORY career. GLORY featherweight world champion Petch (169-40-3, 27 KO) and RISE national champion Kento Haraguchi (25-3-1, 14 KO) made their trilogy fight official for the co-main event. Two former middleweight title challengers collide as the number one ranked Michael Boapeah (17-4-1, 7 KO) takes on the number three ranked Ulric Bokeme (32-5, 17 KO), both...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Donovan Wisse (20-1, 10 KO) puts his middleweight championship on the line against number one contender Ulric Bokeme (32-4, 17 KO) in the main event of the evening. Wisse is one of the top P4P kickboxers on the planet today and is chasing his fourth straight title defense. After his Grand Prix heroics, the number one ranked heavyweight Levi Rigters (17-2, 8 KO) returns to action to take on dangerous late notice replacement Nico Pereira Horta (22-8, 3 KO) in the co-main event. The ‘King of The Hague’ crown is up for grabs when rivals Michael Boapeah (16-4-1, 7 KO) and Serkan Ozcaglayan (45-9, 36 KO) clash. The two top middleweights meet in this local derby match-up where the winner walks...

programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Vern McNeice as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Noah Ali takes us through a day of coaching and reveals how it has impacted his day-to-day life and what he loves about being on the outside of the cage. See what it takes to prepare other fighters for a match.

programme.title: INDIVIDUAL FIGHTS
programme.desc: Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E218 Undercover Love S1 E218
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dholi Beats
programme.sub-title: S01 : E218 Dholi Beats S1 E218
programme.desc: The story revolves around Geet, a young woman who follows her father's footsteps as a dhol player, challenging societal norms about gender roles in music. Her journey is supported by her husband, Malhar, who helps her pursue her dreams.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E218 King of Hearts S1 E218
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E218 Second Chances S1 E218
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Jodha Akbar S3 E12
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E218 This is Fate S1 E218
programme.desc: Arjun spends time with Preeta and the Aroras. When he returns home, Anjali overhears him confessing his feelings for Preeta alone in the car.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Jodha Akbar S3 E12
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.
